:::{.callout-note title="AKA"}
hemoglobin A1c (glycated hemoglobin, glycosylated hemoglobin, HbA1c, or A1c) test
:::



- Measure of glucose control for previous 2-3 months
- Goal for DM 6-7%
- Higher number=worse control
